理屈と膏薬はどこへでもつく: (りくつとこうやくはどこへでもつく) - one can give a plausible argument for anything
理屈と膏薬はどこへでも付く: (りくつとこうやくはどこへでもつく) - one can give a plausible argument for anything
理屈に合う: (りくつにあう) - to be reasonable; to stand to reason; to be logical; to hold water
理屈をつける: (りくつをつける) - to find an excuse; to rationalize; to find a pretext
理工学部: (りこうがくぶ) - department of science and engineering
理工科: (りこうか) - department of science and technology
理念: (りねん) - (Platonic) ideal (of how things ought to be, e.g. human rights); foundational principle; idea; conception (e.g. of the university); doctrine; ideology
理性に訴える: (りせいにうったえる) - to appeal to one's reason
理性のタガ: (りせいのタガ) - the bounds of reason; the limits of (common) sense
理性の箍: (りせいのたが) - the bounds of reason; the limits of (common) sense
理想気体: (りそうきたい) - ideal gas; perfect gas
理想的な言語使用者: (りそうてきなげんごしようしゃ) - ideal speaker-hearer
理想郷: (りそうきょう) - ideal land; earthly paradise; Utopia; Arcadia
理由の原理: (りゆうのげんり) - principle of reason (logic)
理由をつける: (りゆうをつける) - to give a reason
理由を付ける: (りゆうをつける) - to give a reason
理神: (りしん) - deism; belief in God as creator of universe
理科大学: (りかだいがく) - college of science
理科年表: (りかねんぴょう) - chronological scientific tables
理系ばなれ: (りけいばなれ) - flight from science
理系女: (りけいじょ) - women in the sciences; female scientists
理系女子: (りけいじょし) - women in the sciences; female scientists
理系女性: (りけいじょせい) - women in the sciences; female scientists
理系離れ: (りけいばなれ) - flight from science
理解しがたい: (りかいしがたい) - hard to understand; Byzantine fashion
理解し合う: (りかいしあう) - to reach mutual understanding; to understand each other
理解を求める: (りかいをもとめる) - to ask for understanding
理解を深める: (りかいをふかめる) - to cultivate a better understanding
理解を示す: (りかいをしめす) - to show understanding; to appreciate; to be positive about
理解不能: (りかいふのう) - impossible to understand; impossible to decipher
理解力: (りかいりょく) - (power of) understanding; comprehensive faculty
理論体系: (りろんたいけい) - body of theory
理論武装: (りろんぶそう) - (yoji) being prepared for a theoretical (ideological) argument; being armed with theoretical backing
理論物理学: (りろんぶつりがく) - theoretical physics
理論生物学: (りろんせいぶつがく) - theoretical biology
理論空燃比: (りろんくうねんひ) - theoretical air fuel ratio
理路整然: (りろせいぜん) - (yoji) logical; cogent; well-reasoned
理非: (りひ) - judgement of right and wrong (judgment)
理非曲直: (りひきょくちょく) - (yoji) the rights and wrongs (of a case)
琉歌: (りゅうか) - Okinawan fixed form poetry
琉球: (りゅうきゅう) - Ryukyu; chain of southwestern Japanese islands comprising Okinawa Prefecture
琉球使節: (りゅうきゅうしせつ) - Ryukyuan mission to Edo
琉球処分: (りゅうきゅうしょぶん) - Disposition of Ryukyu; forced assimilation of Okinawa into Japan, ending its tributary relations with China and abolishing the Ryukyu Kingdom (1872-1879)
琉球出兵: (りゅうきゅうしゅっぺい) - Invasion of Ryukyu
